title: Scales of Justice
description: A serial killer is stalking people in Shreveport Louisiana.  Detective Turner, the former golden boy on the force, is frustrated he has no leads and looks to make his own.  Judge Joseph Harris is being blackmailed by the killer and is trying to get his life back.  The best hope Shreveport has in the hands of Detective Paul Landry, but he's a drunk that is haunted by the loss of his former lover.  All in all, Shreveport isn't looking good right now.
author: David B. Moon
